Text:
All i can say is WTF! How can you take the UKF albums/collections and then say oh I want a personal version ?:? This is already uploaded as a different torrent situated here: http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5970476/UKF_Dubstep_(All_Tracks) With ALL of it, which is really amazing, may I add.

Idiot.

I was making a playlist for friends and after a million issues transfering the files I decided just make a torrent and they can download it. I'm well aware of the full torrent with all of the tracks as I have downloaded it to make this playlist.
